welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sapulpa, a charming city known for its friendly community and historic charm. We invite you to explore our beautiful town and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport houses all major airlines and provides access to all airport amenities.

terminals.name: North Concourse
terminals.description: The North Concourse at Tulsa International Airport serves as a hub for regional airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: South Concourse
terminals.description: The South Concourse at Tulsa International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Okmulgee Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Okmulgee Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
